DOC.brief_summary: Patients diagnose Stage IV cancer ( solid tumor ) evaluate determine whether candidate traditional chemotherapy . If eligible , patient offer traditional chemotherapy , low-dose chemotherapy , palliative care . If ineligible , patient offer low-dose chemotherapy palliative care . Patients monitor 5 year survival data record .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Survival Outcomes Stage IV Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: Presenting Stage IV cancer ( solid tumor ) Patient decline inclusion
